scripts.web:devw: source ./setup-env.sh ${npm_config_env} && VITE_APP_VERSION=${npm_package_version} npm -w packages/web run dev
scripts.web:build:analyze: VITE_APP_VERSION=${npm_package_version} npm -w packages/web run build -- --mode analyze
scripts.cdk:deploy:quick: npm -w packages/cdk run cdk deploy -- --all --asset-parallelism --asset-prebuild=false --concurrency 3 --method=direct --require-approval never --force
scripts.cdk:deploy:quick:hotswap: npm -w packages/cdk run cdk deploy -- --all --asset-parallelism --asset-prebuild=false --concurrency 3 --method=direct --require-approval never --force --hotswap
scripts.extension:devw: source ./setup-env.sh && cd browser-extension && npm run dev
scripts.extension:buildw: source ./setup-env.sh && cd browser-extension && npm run build
scripts.extension:lint: npx prettier --write browser-extension/. && cd browser-extension && npm run lint
